description:
THE FAITHBUILDER MINISTRY TEACHING WITH LADONNA J HITE

FAITHBUILDER: DOUBLE VISION

This is a free course.

At the end of this section the audience will be able to give careful thought to their life process and other people around them! They will take into consideration Strength and Faith over problems!

Course Title: FAITHBUILDER: DOUBLE VISION

Course Goals: You will mature in matters concerning the heart that fluctuate our impulses to sin.

STUDENTS

APPLICATION TO LIFE

At the end of my course, students will be able to...

Examine their life’s choices concerning the death of sin!

Who should take this course? Who should not?

The Audience is the choice!

What will students need to know or do before starting the course?

Real strength comes in FAITH! Fear has got to go further away from the truth or we’ll find ourselves crippled, and going in circles of the same products of life! How to get more for nothing!

Course Structure: FAITH-BASED ministry material! This course may contain Pre-recorded Periscope ministry video(s) with or without prayer, with a Prophetic Word from GOD!  Scribe: Written (typed text) material that is motivating and elevating at the same time! Diligent work is the outcome. Length of time to complete this coursework: 1 day.

Don't be alarmed by the Prophetic "PRINT LAYOUT!" in text and eBook(s). It is the trademark of the work!

Class Curriculum

First Section

INTERVIEW WITH THE AUTHOR LADONNA J HITE: WHY? (1:26)

INTRODUCTION TO FAITHBUILDER 101 (2:08)

NUMBER 1: THE IMPORTANCE OF FAITH (1:45)

THINK ON THIS QUIZ

NUMBER 2: PRAY! PRAY! PRAY! (2:32)

NUMBER 3: WHAT SHALL SEPARATE YOU FROM THE LOVE OF GOD? (5:05)

NUMBER 4: THE HOLY SPIRIT IN YOU (2:26)

NUMBER 5: A PROMISE IS A PROMISE (2:44)

NUMBER 6: MUMBLE JUMBLE (4:42)

NUMBER 7: DON'T LET DOWN YOUR HANDS (3:12)

NUMBER 8: GO-GO GADGET ARMOUR (2:02)

NUMBER 9: A GOOD WORKER'S PAY (2:40)

NUMBER 10: REMARKS (1:26)

A FREE FAITHBUILDER'S GIFT
title: Faithbuilder: Double Vision
